text:
Nice food and unique taste and worthwhile to try. Second time we go and this time took the kids along and they even loved it more than us. Price is reasonable and so are the portions. For sure recommend.
We ordered the beef fresh noodles and beef dumplings and beef skewers. Also their coffee and homemade tea has a unique taste.
Went again with kids for lunch. Tried potato slices and beef soup with bamboo shoots. See photos. We all enjoyed the food, especially the kids.

Was recommended by a colleague to try this newly open restaurant. The place is nice and clean. The service is fast and friendly. The cutleries and bowls are kept in sanitized cabinet with temperature controlled. The food are fresh and the portions are generous. I love the cooked lamb, so soft and succulent. The beef is amazingly soft and tender. I noticed lots of malay muslims patronised the restaurant. The home-made yogurt is incredibly delicious that you’ll want more than one cup! Definitely worth it and value for money! Wish the restaurant more success! Will definitely becoming again to be our favourite place for halal chinese muslim steamboat.

Delicious. Only hope they can improve the drinks.
Beef noodle nice, xinjiang chicken RM65 is a big portion. Dumpling so so

Good and authentic version of chinese muslim food. Big portion and reasonable price. Good customer service of all staff there. Nice shop interior design. The serve Ala Carte and Hot Pot, need to clarify to staff there. They will help and assist you.

Affordable & Recommended All-You-Can-Eat Hot Pot Cina Muslim"

If you're looking for a halal and delicious all-you-can-eat hot pot experience, this place is a must-try! The menu offers a variety of fresh and flavorful ingredients, including halal meats, seafood, and vegetables, all at a very reasonable price.

What stands out the most is the affordability—perfect for families, friends, or even solo diners who want to enjoy a hearty meal without breaking the bank. The service is friendly, and the overall atmosphere is cozy and welcoming.

Highly recommended for anyone craving halal stemboat style!
